Updated 8/21/2019

Below is an estimated schedule for the Alderman book move, as materials will be temporarily moved to Clemons and Ivy during the renovation. This page will be updated periodically as the move progresses.

Looking for particular titles? Virgo remains the most authoritative source for the location of Library materials. As usual, LEO delivery service is available for materials stored in any location.

Italicized dates are estimates.

Call number range Move begins*
A mid May
B mid May
BC-BD mid/late May
BF mid/late May
BH-BM mid/late May
BP-BX early June
C early/mid June
D June
E early July
F early/mid July
G mid July
H-HC July
HD-HJ July
HM-HX July
J late July
K early August
L early August
P-PM early/mid August
PN mid August
PQ mid/late August
PR early September
PS late September
PT-PZ early October
U-Z mid October

Our goal is to complete the book move in November but flex time has been built in through December in case unforeseen challenges necessitate additional time. We anticipate the move being fully complete by end of calendar year 2019.

*Within any given call number range, the Clemons items will begin their move first, and Ivy Stacks items will begin their move shortly thereafter.
